column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I also prefer the dining experience
column2: as Malnati's is a bit less cramped than the typical Chicago pizzeria and the lines are generally shorter due to the multiple locations in high traffic areas. It's hard to cite hard facts
column3: as it's been awhile since I've visited another Chicago pizza parlor (one visit per trip home is about all my diet can handle)
column4: but my gut tells me the prices are more reasonable than most as well.
